title: Venezuela 1-1 Argentina: Rondon equaliser thwarts world champions on Messi return
description: Argentina dropped points in a second successive CONMEBOL World Cup qualifier, as Venezuela held them to a 1-1 draw in Maturin. The spoils were shared at Estadio Monumental de Maturin, where Salomon Rondon’s second-half header cancelled out Nicolas Otamendi’s earlier effort. After heavy rain delayed kick-off, Argentina took the lead in the 13th minute. Venezuela […] The post Venezuela 1-1 Argentina: Rondon equaliser thwarts world champions on Messi return appeared first on Soccer News.
author: SoccerNews

title: Israel 1-4 France: Rampant Bleus clinch back-to-back Nations League wins
description: France made it back-to-back wins in the Nations League, with Christopher Nkunku and Bradley Barcola among the scorers as they thrashed Israel 4-1 in Hungary. title: Haaland becomes Norway´s record scorer with Slovenia brace
description: Erling Haaland became Norway’s all-time leading scorer with a brace in their 3-0 victory over Slovenia. The Manchester City striker was captaining his first nation for the first time, and marked the occasion in trademark record-breaking fashion. Haaland broke the deadlock after just seven minutes of the Nations League clash at the Ullevaal Stadium, where […] The post Haaland becomes Norway´s record scorer with Slovenia brace appeared first on Soccer News.

title: Zubimendi plays down Manchester City links
description: Martin Zubimendi rejected the chance to join Liverpool this summer, choosing to stay at Real Sociedad. There have been rumours about him possibly regretting his decision, though he has always maintained that he remains loyal to the Basque club. More recently, the 25-year-old Spain international has been linked very heavily with Manchester City, who have […] The post Zubimendi plays down Manchester City links appeared first on Soccer News.
author: Veselin Trajkovic

description: Former England manager Gareth Southgate has been tipped to succeed Erik ten Hag in the Manchester United dugout, should the club decide to part ways with the Dutchman. title: England 1-2 Greece: Pavlidis ends Carsley´s perfect start with stunning brace
description: Vangelis Pavlidis’ dramatic 94th-minute winner brought Lee Carsley’s perfect start to life as interim England coach crashing to a halt, as the Benfica forward netted twice in a stunning 2-1 win at Wembley. title: Italy 2-2 Belgium: Trossard completes comeback to deny 10-man hosts
description: Italy dropped their first points of this Nations League campaign, as they were held to a 2-2 draw by Belgium in Rome. title: Manchester City’s Legal “Victory” Against Premier League Commercial Rules
description: In recent years, Manchester City Football Club has found itself at the centre of various legal disputes, notably concerning financial regulations. While the club currently faces charges related to breaches of Premier League financial rules, it has also mounted a legal challenge against the Premier League’s Associated Party Transaction (APT) rules, which govern commercial deals.
